metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30682 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions. This issue is fixedin tvOS 14.6, iOS 14.6 and iPadOS 14.6, Safari 14.1.1, macOS Big Sur 11.4,watchOS 7.5. A malicious application may be able to leak sensitive userinformation.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
